comments.author: blackwatertown
comments.content:
That's a decent result then.
I let my imagination direct my travelling - when I am free to make up my own mind. This means I go places for reasons not immediately apparent to other people, for odd reasons. I do not worry too much about the optimum path - the road not previously tried is usually a good one. Guess that makes me more of a Frank, when I get the chance.
